title: Label Descriptor
description: Describes a label at the field level for a given class/fieldgroup/schema

xdm:excludeProperty.title: Exclude Property
xdm:excludeProperty.description: When present, the property of the source schema to which this descriptor excludes. This value is a JSON Pointer, applied to an instance of an object described by `xdm:sourceSchema`.

xdm:labels.title: Labels
xdm:labels.description: When present, it allows an array of labels. Values are DULE labels, such as coe/C1, custom/myLabel, org/teamOne

xdm:labelsInPES.title: Labels in PES
xdm:labelsInPES.description: When present, it allows an array of labels to be registered in PES. Values are DULE labels. The values must be a subset of xdm:labels
